message: Stop!

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Hey!"
...Shit.

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Owwww..."

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "Hey! What do you think you're doing?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Sorry."

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "You hit a girl! You think sorry's gonna cut it?!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Settle down, ladies. He's sorry. And look, I'm sorry. "
Koujaku cuts between us and grasps the hands of the woman I smacked away.

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "But Koujaku!"

name: 紅雀
message: "I'll let you in on a little secret. This guy here? He doesn't have a lot of experience with women."

name: 紅雀
message: "So he doesn't know how to act around pretty ladies like yourselves. You understand, right?"
Koujaku shoots me a look. He's asking me to play along.

name: 紅雀
message: "Could you forgive him? For me?"

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Well, if you say so..."

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "Yeah..."
The women look at me with eyes full of pity.
I feel a little annoyed, but mostly, I'm relieved.
Koujaku really saved my ass. He knows how much I hate it when people touch my hair.
